summary: Adds 8 NEW smithable items based on weaponry from the TV show "Vikings". Comes in 2k and 4k Resolutions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/91r8Y9d.png[/img][/url][/center][center][img]https://i.imgur.com/BmSR6N9.png[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]1wtRl_7XKjc[/youtube] [youtube]jsxdcb8sw-Y[/youtube][/center]

[b]About:[/b]

As a big fan of the TV show Vikings, I was surprised to find very little mods based on the show. I decided to make some of my favourites from the show and while I could have gone into all the different shield variations, I wanted to keep it focused on the main characters.

This mod would be perfect for those that love the TV show or those that just want some new Viking weapons for their character! Dual Wielding Characters would also benefit!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] 

[b]Lothbrok Axe[/b]
[color=#999999]12 Base Damage[/color]

[b]Lagertha Sword[/b]
[color=#999999]12 Base Damage[/color]

[b]Floki Axe[/b]
[color=#999999]10 Base Damage & +20% Increased Swing Speed[/color]

[b]Floki Adz[/b]
[color=#999999]8 Base Damage & +50% Increased Swing Speed[/color]

[b]Lothbrok Shield (Heavy & Light)[/b]
[color=#999999]28 /26 Armor Rating[/color]

[b]Lagertha Shield (Heavy & Light)[/b]
[color=#999999]28 / 26 Armor Rating[/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

Each item is smithed under the "Steel" category. Stats were increased to be better than Orcish.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. What ENB are you using?
A. A modified PRT/PTR? I dunno.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- Slight clipping with some armor types. I think this goes for a lot of shields though.

Cleaned with SSEedit.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[center][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14409][img]https://i.imgur.com/zSXHNpu.png[/img][/url][/center]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod! [b]Remember, modding is stressful and we do it for free![/b]

[color=#ff0000][b]PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE! THIS INCLUDES BETHESDAS WEBSITE![/b][/color]
author: johnskyrim

files.name: Vikings Weaponry - Johnskyrim
files.changelogHtml: - Fixed an issue where Lagertha Shield was using the wrong inventory model when used on female characters
